title: Playing against Cassiopeia is the most unfun thing in league
body:
There is for example Lee, who is super oppressive when played properly with an insanely high pick rate, or there is Kayle who can be really oppressive when played safely till late game but then there is cassiopeia who is strong at all stages of the game.

Q's you once in lane and e's you to death

you cant even FLASH when she placed her miasma which is huge as fuck and cover a whole lane
(champions like zed or yasuo cant even ult) / she can set up ganks easily with it

with rylias she is pure cancer

She is super ultra annoying to play against. If she hits a q once she can bully you easily out of lane. You either pick a long range mage or you are screwed. 
A champion with such a disgusting late game dps shouldnt be so strong early.

What are your thoughts on cass?

replies.body:
From what I understand, you like to use champions that make you the worst kind of person and are complaining about a counter to them.
Sounds legit.

> [{quoted}](name=Shuyin178,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1NTQE1iY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-30T01:05:55.082+0000)
>
> From what I understand, you like to use champions that make you the worst kind of person and are complaining about a counter to them.
> Sounds legit.

Nah i only play nidalee.
That doesn't help your argument in the slightest.
I can name about 50 champions more annoying but okay.
Don't play nidalee, I'm a Cassiopeia main and nidalee is easy food
Nah, you're just playing an awful laning champion. Nidalee is a jungler, not a laner.

You can flash her miasma, which is why it was given a travel time so that you can react to flash before it hits the ground. 

Rylais is getting a nerf.

She can only do the QEEEE once or twice, because she runs out of many very quick before getting a tear. Ask for an early gank and shut her down.

> [{quoted}](name=SlayerTay6,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1NTQE1iY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-30T01:00:35.983+0000)
>
> You can flash her miasma, which is why it was given a travel time so that you can react to flash before it hits the ground. 
> 
> Rylais is getting a nerf.
> 
> She can only do the QEEEE once or twice, because she runs out of many very quick before getting a tear. Ask for an early gank and shut her down.

once is enough to bully me out of lane :')
